All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivateShadows
The ActivateShadows class is responsible for enabling shadows.
Builder
The Builder interface defines methods for constructing a Scene.
Camera
The Camera class represents the viewpoint and configuration of a camera.
Color
The Color class represents a color using RGB values.
ColorDamier
The ColorDamier class is an implementation of the IColorStrategy interface that provides a checkerboard pattern of colors.
ColorUnie
The ColorUnie class is an implementation of the IColorStrategy interface that provides a uniform color across all pixels.
DeactivateShadows
The DeactivateShadows class is responsible for disabling shadows.
DirectionalLight
The DirectionalLight class represents a directional light source.
ICalculStrategy
The ICalculStrategy interface defines a method for performing ray tracing calculations.
IColorStrategy
An interface for color strategies used to determine the color at a specific position (i, j).
ILight
The ILight interface defines methods for obtaining information about a light source, including its color, direction, and position.
Image
The Image class represents an image with width, height, and a name.
IObjetScene
The IObjetScene interface defines methods for objects in a scene.
IShadowState
The IShadowState interface defines a method for managing the state of shadows.
Lambert
The Lambert class is responsible for performing Lambert shading.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the ray tracing.
Normal
The Normal class is responsible for performing ray tracing with a basic shading model.
Parser
The Parser class is responsible for parsing a scene description file and constructing a scene with objects, lights, and camera configurations based on the file contents.
Plan
Represents a plan object in the 3D scene.
Point
Represents a 3D point in space with coordinates (x, y, z).
PonctualLight
Represents a point light source in the scene with a specified color and position.
Scene
Represents a 3D scene with a camera, image, colors, objects, and lights.
SceneBuilder
A builder class for constructing a 3D scene with a camera, image, colors, objects, and lights.
Shadow
The `Shadow` class represents a component responsible for managing shadow rendering in a 3D scene.
Sphere
The `Sphere` class represents a 3D spherical object in a scene.
Triangle
Represents a triangle object in the 3D scene.
Triplet
Represents a 3D vector with components x, y, and z.
Vector
Represents a 3D vector with components x, y, and z.
